title: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems
description: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems. I need to first click on one of the "live" areas before it starts working (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame.)
OB: When I launch the Help view on Windows 2000, the tab key does not have any effect.
EB: We should start the Help view in a way that allows immediate navigation via the keyboard.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Launch the Help view. 2. Press the tab key and observe that it does nothing.
